content.prompt: In contrast to how Rodin composed the sculpture, his patrons had which of the following expectations?

choices.label: Figures would be posed as classical nudes.
There would be a continuous narrative within an architectural frieze.
There would be an allegorical figure representing Liberty.
The burghers would be represented in a glorified manner.

topic.text: 4.2: Purpose and Audience in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, function, and/or context of a work of art (or group of related works of art) elicit a response or shape its reception.
